description:
ALCA has finally finished deliberating over the ncident that happened at the end of December. Fortunately, they have decided that no one will be punished for what happened, and actually consider Nina`s actions at the time to be worthy of praise. So much so that they`ve asked to see Nina for an interview. Nina has finally gotten her big break, but how do Lion and the rest of her friends feel about it?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Good Fortune Will Come to Hinas Who Smile
Warau Hina ni wa Fuku Kitaru
笑うヒナには福きたる
